name: ImpactResistanceClass
title: Impact Resistance Class
description: Impact Resistance Class codes for insurance operations.

concept.definition: No impact resistance rating or classification applied to the material or component.
Lowest level of impact resistance rating, typically withstanding impacts from small hail (up to 1 inch diameter).
Moderate impact resistance rating, typically withstanding impacts from hail up to 1.25 inches in diameter.
Enhanced impact resistance rating, typically withstanding impacts from hail up to 1.75 inches in diameter.
Highest standard impact resistance rating, typically withstanding impacts from hail up to 2 inches in diameter as defined by UL 2218.
